author: coheigea
msg: [WSS-99] - Fixed the problems with my previous merge
- The strategy now is to insert BC directly after the SUN provider or the IBMJCE provider in the case of AIX.
- This solves the current problems with inserting BC in position 2 on Sun and AIX.
- If there's a problem then it falls back to the old strategy.
- Tested on Linux, Solaris and AIX.

author: mturk
msg: Use path.separator propery instead fixed colon so it can run on windows as well
